QUOTE_1:
The journey is the reward. 
-Chinese Proverb
QUOTE_2: Make everything as simple as possible, but not simpler-Einstein
QUOTE_3: I find that harder I work, the more luck I seem to have-Thomas Jefferson
QUOTE_4:
Life's most urgent question is: what are you doing for others?
-Martin L. King
QUOTE_5: A leader is a dealer in hope-Napolean
QUOTE_6: Friends may come and go, but enemies accumulate-Thomas Jones
QUOTE_7: Never look down on anybody unless you're helping him up.
QUOTE_8:
We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
-Martin L. King
QUOTE_9: The shortest distance between two points is under construction.
QUOTE_10:
Management is doing things right, leadership is doing the right things.
-Peter F. Drucker
QUOTE_11:
How to deal with death is at least as important as how to deal with life.
-Star Trek II
QUOTE_12:
I am not afraid of death, I just don't want to be there when it happens.
-Woody Allen
QUOTE_13:
Victory goes to the player who makes the next-to-last mistake.
-C. Tartakower
QUOTE_14: Know yourself and you will win all battles. Sun Tzu
QUOTE_15:
One who makes no mistakes makes nothing.
-Anonymous
QUOTE_16:
Everybody pities the weak, jealousy you have to earn.
-Schwarzenegger
QUOTE_17:
We didn't lose the game, we just ran out of time.
-Vince Lambordi
QUOTE_18:
Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
-Jimi Hendrix
QUOTE_19:
Success is simple. Do what's right, the right way, at right time.
-Arnold Glascow
QUOTE_20:
The Key to successful leadership is influence, not authority.
-Kenneth Blanchard
QUOTE_21:
The secret of success is to know something nobody else knows.
-Aristotle
QUOTE_22:
A man can't be too careful in the choice of his enemies.
-Oscar Wilde
QUOTE_23: 7/5th of all people do not understand fractions.
QUOTE_24: A bachelor's life is no life for a single man.
QUOTE_25: A conclusion is simply the place where you got tired of thinking.
QUOTE_26: A drunk mans' words are a sober mans' thoughts.
QUOTE_27: A gentleman is a man who can play the accordion but doesn't.
QUOTE_28: A gentleman is a patient wolf.
QUOTE_29: A professor is one who talks in someone else's sleep.
QUOTE_30:
A single death is a tragedy. A million deaths is a statistic. 
-Joseph Stalin
QUOTE_31: Alcohol is not the answer, it just makes you forget the question.
QUOTE_32: All work and no play, will make you a manager.
QUOTE_33: Anything good in life is either illegal, immoral or fattening.
QUOTE_34: Assumption is the mother of all screw-ups.
QUOTE_35: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow. It empties today of its strength.
QUOTE_36: Depression is merely anger without the enthusiasm.
QUOTE_37: Don't be irreplaceable. If you can't be replaced, you can't be promoted.
QUOTE_38: Early to rise, and early to bed, makes a man healthy but socially dead.
QUOTE_39: Earth first! (We'll strip-mine the other planets later).
QUOTE_40:
Everybody has a plan, 'till they get hit. 
-Mike Tyson
QUOTE_41: Everybody wants to go to heaven, but nobody wants to die.
QUOTE_42:
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently. 
-Henry Ford
QUOTE_43:
First get your facts; then you can distort them at your leisure. 
-Mark Twain
QUOTE_44: For every problem there is one solution which is simple, neat and wrong.
QUOTE_45: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
QUOTE_46: Great minds discuss ideas. Average minds discuss events. Small minds discuss people.
QUOTE_47: How long a minute is depends on what side of the bathroom door you're on.
QUOTE_48: I thought I wanted a career, turns out I just wanted paychecks.
QUOTE_49: Learning from your mistakes is smart, learning from the mistakes of others is wise.
QUOTE_50: Life is what happens to you when you're busy making other plans.
QUOTE_51: Love may be blind but marriage is a real eye-opener.
QUOTE_52: Married men live longer than single men, but they're a lot more willing to die.
QUOTE_53:
My one regret in life is that I am not someone else. 
-Woody Allen
QUOTE_54: Never argue with a fool, they will lower you to their level and then beat you with experience.
QUOTE_55: Only dead fish go with the flow.
QUOTE_56:
Teamwork is essential 
-it allows you to blame someone else.
QUOTE_57: The only job you start at the top is digging a hole.
QUOTE_58: The shortest distance between two points is under construction.
QUOTE_59: The sooner you fall behind, the more time you'll have to catch up.
QUOTE_60: There are no short cuts to any place worth going.
QUOTE_61: There's a fine line between fishing and just standing on the shore like an idiot.
QUOTE_62: To steal ideas from one person is plagiarism; to steal from many is research.
QUOTE_63: Today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
QUOTE_64: Viewer discretion may be advised, but it's never really expected.
QUOTE_65:
War does not determine who is right 
-only who is left.
QUOTE_66: Warning: Dates in calendar are closer than they appear.
QUOTE_67: Wasting time is an important part of living.
QUOTE_68: We all can't be heroes. Somebody has to sit on the sides and clap as they go by.
QUOTE_69:
We found Jesus 
-he was behind the sofa all along.
QUOTE_70: We live in a society where pizza gets to your house before the police.
QUOTE_72: What happens if you get scared half to death twice?
QUOTE_73: What has been seen cannot be unseen.
QUOTE_74: What the hell, go ahead and put all your eggs in one basket.
QUOTE_75: What we anticipate seldom occurs; what we least expect generally happens.
QUOTE_76: When everything's coming your way, you're in the wrong lane.
QUOTE_77: When I am sad, I sing, and then the world is sad with me.
QUOTE_78: When I was young I was told that anyone could be president. Now I'm beginning to believe it.
QUOTE_79: When in doubt, do what the President does. Guess.
QUOTE_80: When it's dark enough you can see the stars.
QUOTE_81: When someone points skyward, it's the fool that looks at the finger.
QUOTE_82: When the pin is pulled, Mr. grenade is not our friend.
QUOTE_83: When you don't know what you are doing, do it neatly.
QUOTE_84: While having never invented a sin, I'm trying to perfect several.
QUOTE_85: Whoever said nothing was impossible never tried slamming a revolving door.
QUOTE_86: Work harder: millions on welfare depend on you.
QUOTE_87: Work is the curse of the drinking class.
QUOTE_88: Worry is a misuse of the imagination.
QUOTE_89: Worry is like a rocking chair; it keeps you busy, but gets you nowhere.
QUOTE_90: You are only truly in control of your life when you accept you are not.
QUOTE_91: You can do more with a kind word and a gun than with just a kind word.
QUOTE_92: You can observe a lot just by watching.
QUOTE_93: You can only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
QUOTE_94: You do not need a parachute to skydive. You only need a parachute to skydive twice.
QUOTE_95: You don't have to explain something you never said.
QUOTE_96: You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you're all the same.
QUOTE_97: You're only young once, but you can be immature forever.
QUOTE_98: Your true value depends entirely on what you are compared with.
QUOTE_99: In examinations, the foolish ask questions the wise cannot answer.
QUOTE_101: Life is about making the right decisions and moving on.
QUOTE_102: Forgiveness and letting go are steps on our road back to happiness.
QUOTE_103: Never give up on anybody. Miracles happen everyday.
QUOTE_104: A successful team is a group of many hands but of one mind.
QUOTE_105: The more arguments you win, the less friends you will have.
QUOTE_106: You know what a camera is? A mirror with memory.
QUOTE_107: What appears to be the end may really be a new beginning.
QUOTE_108: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
QUOTE_109: Tears are words the heart can't express.
QUOTE_110: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
QUOTE_111: Depression is merely anger without enthusiasm.
QUOTE_112: Vacations often go to fast! Enjoy every minute!
QUOTE_113: College is the longest vacation you will ever take.
QUOTE_114: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
QUOTE_115: Problems are only opportunities in work clothes.
QUOTE_116: You can learn a line from a win and a book from a defeat.
QUOTE_117: Never treat your audience as customers, always as partners.
QUOTE_118: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
QUOTE_119: The quality of expectations determines the quality of our action.
QUOTE_120: All change is not growth; as all movement is not forward.
QUOTE_121: A man's work is from sun to sun, but a mother's work is never done.
QUOTE_122: The heart is the only broken instrument that works.
QUOTE_123: History proves nothing because it contains everything.
QUOTE_124: A library is thought in cold storage.
QUOTE_125: The secret to a rich life is to have more beginnings than endings.
QUOTE_126: Those you trust the most can steal the most.
QUOTE_127: Blood cannot be washed out with blood.
QUOTE_128: The best place to find a helping hand is at the end of your own arm.
QUOTE_129: Blame is a lazy man's wages.
QUOTE_130: To understand your parents' love you must raise children yourself.
QUOTE_131: Count your nights by stars, not shadows; count your life with smiles, not tears.
QUOTE_132: Before preparing to improve the world, first look around your own home three times.
QUOTE_133: People who have little to do are excessive talkers.
QUOTE_134: Conversation shortens the distance, singing lightens the load.
QUOTE_135: The ego is nothing other than the focus of conscious attention.
QUOTE_136: Anger, tears and sadness are only for those who have given up.
QUOTE_137: Civilization has been a permanent dialogue between human beings and water.
QUOTE_138: I believe there's only one autobiography you can do.
QUOTE_139: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
QUOTE_140: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
QUOTE_141: Honest disagreement is often a good sign of progress.
QUOTE_142: No culture can live, if it attempts to be exclusive.
QUOTE_143: When the solution is simple, God is answering.
QUOTE_144: A country cannot simultaneously prepare and prevent war.
QUOTE_145: Try not to become a man of success but rather try to become a man of value.
QUOTE_146: Peace cannot be kept by force. It can only be achieved by understanding.
